course_description: This course will build a strong foundation in atomic and molecular structure. Students will interpret experimental data to explain structure, properties, and relationships. OCCP completion counts 3% of course grade. Students who withdraw from the lecture should withdraw from the laboratory course also.
prerequisites: CHEM_OX 150L co-requisite. During the enrollment process, student must enroll in CHEM_OX 150L first, to be able to enroll in CHEM_OX 150. Students must be enrolled in both courses or will be dropped at the end of preregistration or Add/Drop/Swap.
